# Title : [Short description]

## Description
Clear and precise explanation of the isssue.

## Acceptance criterias
- [ ] Critère 1
- [ ] Critère 2

## Type
- [ ] Bug
- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Docs
- [ ] Other (Please be precise)
## Notes / Informations complémentaires
- Screenshots
- Logs
- References / documentation
